channel.title: Chickenfoot - quite possibly the best band ever
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j_EMFYrZVrw
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HX-OwmvuBjA&feature=related
Chickenfoot is a band featuring vocalist Sammy Hagar (ex-Van Halen), bassist Michael "Mikey" Anthony (also ex-Van Halen), guitarist Joe Satriani and drummer Chad Smith (of the Red Hot Chili Peppers).

item.title: Chickenfoot - quite possibly the best band ever
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

lawl was talking about them in IRC yesterday.

pretty good…not sure i like the vocals too much though.

Read full topic
item.source: Chickenfoot - quite possibly the best band ever
